data.trans: Xoay xở làm được mà không cần ai hay thứ gì đó
data.trans_hint: Tôi không thể xoay xở mà không có kế hoạch được.
data.en_hint: I can't do without a plan.
data.content_game_1: I can't do without a plan.
data.answer_en_hint: I can't do without a plan.

data.trans_hint: Kỳ thi đang tới gần, nhưng tôi vẫn chưa sẵn sàng cho nó chút nào.
data.en_hint: The exam is coming up, but I am not ready for it at all.
data.content_game_1: The exam is coming up, but I am not ready for it at all.
data.answer_en_hint: The exam is coming up, but I am not ready for it at all.

data.trans: Cực kỳ cần cái gì (trường hợp khẩn cấp)
data.trans_hint: Công ty đang cực kỳ cần những nhân tài mới, những người có thể giúp xoay chuyển tình hình kinh doanh.
data.en_hint: The company is crying out for new talents who can help turn around the business.
data.content_game_1: The company is crying out for new talents who can help turn around the business.
data.answer_en_hint: The company is crying out for new talents who can help turn around the business.

data.trans: Khao khát muốn có cái gì/ muốn làm gì
data.trans_hint: Cô ta nóng lòng muốn hỏi anh ta cô gái mà anh ta gặp tại quán cafe là ai.
data.en_hint: She was dying to ask him who the girl that he met in the coffee shop was.
data.content_game_1: She was dying to ask him who the girl that he met in the coffee shop was.
data.answer_en_hint: She was dying to ask him who the girl that he met in the coffee shop was.

data.trans_hint: Tôi đang đói cồn cào đây. Tôi chưa ăn gì từ sáng tới giờ.
data.en_hint: I'm starving; I haven't eaten anything since the morning.
data.content_game_1: I'm starving; I haven't eaten anything since the morning.
data.answer_en_hint: I'm starving; I haven't eaten anything since the morning.

data.trans: Cần/ muốn có thứ gì (vì nó giúp ích)
data.trans_hint: Tôi thực sự cần một tách cacao nóng ngay bây giờ. Trời bên ngoài thực sự rất lạnh.
data.en_hint: I really could do with a cup of hot chocolate right now. It's really cold outside.
data.content_game_1: I really could do with a cup of hot chocolate right now. It's really cold outside.
data.answer_en_hint: I really could do with a cup of hot chocolate right now. It's really cold outside.

data.trans: Thiếu gì đó (thường dùng ở bị động)
data.trans_hint: Gần đây cô ấy bị thiếu ngủ, vì vậy đừng làm phiền cô ấy.
data.en_hint: She was deprived of sleep recently, so don't bother her.
data.content_game_1: She was deprived of sleep recently, so don't bother her.
data.answer_en_hint: She was deprived of sleep recently, so don't bother her.

data.trans_hint: Đã bao giờ bạn có hứng đi du lịch một mình không?
data.en_hint: Have you ever felt like travelling alone?
data.content_game_1: Have you ever felt like travelling alone?
data.answer_en_hint: Have you ever felt like travelling alone?

data.trans_hint: Laura để mắt tới chiếc Iphone 13 mới.
data.en_hint: Laura has her eye on a new Iphone 13.
data.content_game_1: Laura has her eye on a new Iphone 13.
data.answer_en_hint: Laura has her eye on a new Iphone 13.

data.trans: Cực kỳ muốn thứ gì đó (đắt, quan trọng, lớn,...)
data.trans_hint: Tôi cực kỳ muốn đi du lịch tới Châu Âu vào cuối năm.
data.en_hint: I have my heart set on a trip to Europe at the end of the year.
data.content_game_1: I have my heart set on a trip to Europe at the end of the year.
data.answer_en_hint: I have my heart set on a trip to Europe at the end of the year.

data.trans: Xoay sở với thứ gì đó
data.trans_hint: Tôi không thể xoay sở chỉ với một tách trà cho bữa sáng; Tôi luôn cần phải ăn sáng no nê.
data.en_hint: I can't make do with just a cup of tea for breakfast; I always need to have a hearty breakfast.
data.content_game_1: I can't make do with just a cup of tea for breakfast; I always need to have a hearty breakfast.
data.answer_en_hint: I can't make do with just a cup of tea for breakfast; I always need to have a hearty breakfast.

data.trans_hint: Không cần phải vội vàng vì ta có đủ thời gian mà.
data.en_hint: There is no need to rush about because we have enough time.
data.content_game_1: There is no need to rush about because we have enough time.
data.answer_en_hint: There is no need to rush about because we have enough time.
